title: 由幾個BB S&T analyst/asso寫嘅金融資訊IG page

replies.msg:
大家每日收到成千上萬條金融資訊
好多時候都冇時間去過濾、理解、消化
有時候又會錯失左一啲重要資訊

有見及此
我哋幾個小薯仔希望幫下大家
每日會寫3-5條我哋覺得當日最重要嘅金融新聞同埋有啲分析
等大家同其他人吹水、比老細問到嘅時候都有兩句可以講吓
投資嘅時候亦都唔會忽略咗一啲重要嘅考量點
同埋我地會分享啲得意既財經故事

如果有啲特別嘅topic 嘅話
我哋會用深入淺出嘅方式去嘗試解釋某啲金融議題
例如我哋兩個月之前就係seeking alpha解答過一個投資新手 點解油價會係負數
如下
Implications of Negative Oil Price


How it turned negative?
From the crude producers’ perspective, it is about a growing glut of crude and a lack of storage space.
Imagining you are a crude oil producer, what do you do if nobody wants the crude that comes out of your oil well?
You can’t burn it or pour it into the river. You can’t turn your oil wells off (oil wells are expensive to drill, and you think prices will be positive again in the future, so you don’t want to lose the well). However, oil keeps coming out from your wells in the meantime, so you need someone to take it off your hands, even if you need to pay for that. That’s why the price of crude can go negative.

From an investor’s perspective, why the WTI May Future fell to negative territory? What does it mean to buy an oil future like that?
First, buyer (sellers) of a single WTI May 2020 oil futures contract means someone makes an agreement to buy (sell) 1,000 barrels at the contract price in May 2020. The buyer of the contract will get the physical delivery of barrels of oil in May through different ways such as asking the seller to pump the oil into the buy’s designated pipeline or storage facility if they are linked to seller’s pipeline or storage facility (btw the oil flows from Cushing, Oklahoma).

Unlike refineries and airlines, traders basically don’t want the oil hence they rushed to sell the contracts on the final trading day of the future, leading to the price plunge.

“Wait… OPEC and its allies, known as OPEC+, got an oil production cut agreement on 9 April, right? Why oil price still dropped?”
Some members of OPEC+, led by Saudi Arabia and Russia, agreed to reduce production by 9.7 million barrels/day starting from 1 May 2020. However that was far from enough as demand was expected by the International Energy Agency (IEA) to fall 23million barrels/day this quarter amid the outbreak of COVID-19.

In the U.S, there is a total crude oil storage capacity of 653 million barrels with 374 million barrels currently stored as of April 10th. Over the past few weeks, there have been 10-19 million-barrel weekly builds, meaning capacity will run out in 18 weeks if the rate remains at 15 million barrels per week.

So, apart from buying futures, what investment I can make if I want to bet on an increase in oil price?
If you're looking to speculate on higher oil prices, your best bet is likely producer equities such as those in the Oil and Gas production ETF (XOP). These companies are all losing money at today's oil prices, but they are trading at a weighted average TTM "P/CF" of 1.3X. They also have greater control because they can slash production today and/or hedge their position and higher long-term prices.
-
大家有興趣嘅話就follow啦
IG link: https://www.instagram.com/finance.digest/

等大家同其他人吹水、比老細問到嘅時候都有兩句可以講吓
投資嘅時候亦都唔會忽略咗一啲重要嘅考量點
同埋我地會分享啲得意既財經故事

如果有啲特別嘅topic 嘅話
我哋會用深入淺出嘅方式去嘗試解釋某啲金融議題
例如我哋兩個月之前就係seeking alpha解答過一個投資新手 點解油價會係負數
如下
Implications of Negative Oil Price


How it turned negative?
From the crude producers’ perspective, it is about a growing glut of crude and a lack of storage space.
Imagining you are a crude oil producer, what do you do if nobody wants the crude that comes out of your oil well?
You can’t burn it or pour it into the river. You can’t turn your oil wells off (oil wells are expensive to drill, and you think prices will be positive again in the future, so you don’t want to lose the well). However, oil keeps coming out from your wells in the meantime, so you need someone to take it off your hands, even if you need to pay for that. That’s why the price of crude can go negative.

From an investor’s perspective, why the WTI May Future fell to negative territory? What does it mean to buy an oil future like that?
First, buyer (sellers) of a single WTI May 2020 oil futures contract means someone makes an agreement to buy (sell) 1,000 barrels at the contract price in May 2020. The buyer of the contract will get the physical delivery of barrels of oil in May through different ways such as asking the seller to pump the oil into the buy’s designated pipeline or storage facility if they are linked to seller’s pipeline or storage facility (btw the oil flows from Cushing, Oklahoma).

Unlike refineries and airlines, traders basically don’t want the oil hence they rushed to sell the contracts on the final trading day of the future, leading to the price plunge.

“Wait… OPEC and its allies, known as OPEC+, got an oil production cut agreement on 9 April, right? Why oil price still dropped?”
Some members of OPEC+, led by Saudi Arabia and Russia, agreed to reduce production by 9.7 million barrels/day starting from 1 May 2020. However that was far from enough as demand was expected by the International Energy Agency (IEA) to fall 23million barrels/day this quarter amid the outbreak of COVID-19.

In the U.S, there is a total crude oil storage capacity of 653 million barrels with 374 million barrels currently stored as of April 10th. Over the past few weeks, there have been 10-19 million-barrel weekly builds, meaning capacity will run out in 18 weeks if the rate remains at 15 million barrels per week.

So, apart from buying futures, what investment I can make if I want to bet on an increase in oil price?
If you're looking to speculate on higher oil prices, your best bet is likely producer equities such as those in the Oil and Gas production ETF (XOP). These companies are all losing money at today's oil prices, but they are trading at a weighted average TTM "P/CF" of 1.3X. They also have greater control because they can slash production today and/or hedge their position and higher long-term prices.
-

replies.msg: 完全免費？咁你地為咩而做呢樣野

寫得幾好
上面油價果篇係真係深入淺出
上兩個月一大班廢物喺度問油價點解負數
20幾頁回覆先有一個人講到個答案出嚟
講完之後班連登仔都仲要睇唔明
我自己見到都廢撚事打篇野去解釋

利申 美資bb research asso

thanks

replies.msg:
1. 再一次證明連登仔最鍾意沖出嚟染 有邊一間BB FO係analyst大過associate? 屌真係笑撚死 你真係搵個窿匿埋算啦 唔好再回覆啦 而家人少少冇咩人見到

2. 我恥笑嘅正正就係呢好似樓上咁嘅連登仔 唔識又沖出嚟柒 唔識又唔願意自己去搵吓答案 唔識又係都要亂鳩咁估 on撚鳩鳩咁渾渾噩噩過世

再者我唔係因為自己有車有樓年薪好而睇人地唔起 我幾時都話莫欺少年窮 我從來都唔會因為自己有少少錢而狗眼看人低 比我有錢嘅人數之不盡

再強調我而家睇唔起嘅就係嗰班不學無術嘅連登仔 你去睇返上兩個月油價個post 成班友連google嘅能力都冇..乜鳩都亂咁估

最後gentle advice for a gentleman
大家應該將樓上嘅回覆引以為戒 經常提醒自己唔好沖出嚟柒 喺網上柒得多久而久之會影響埋你現實做人

如果大家想知多啲ibank grade ladders 可以上https://www.mergersandinquisitions.com/investment-banking-career-path/

on9仔自己柒咗又要起曬鋼 現實都唔知係咩人黎
你自己Google下equity research 最junior既位係咩啦弱智仔
係research入面analyst係可以寫文出paper既人 research associate係幫個analyst寫文既助手咋

quote.msg:
大家每日收到成千上萬條金融資訊
好多時候都冇時間去過濾、理解、消化
有時候又會錯失左一啲重要資訊

有見及此
我哋幾個小薯仔希望幫下大家
每日會寫3-5條我哋覺得當日最重要嘅金融新聞同埋有啲分析
等大家同其他人吹水、比老細問到嘅時候都有兩句可以講吓
投資嘅時候亦都唔會忽略咗一啲重要嘅考量點
同埋我地會分享啲得意既財經故事

如果有啲特別嘅topic 嘅話
我哋會用深入淺出嘅方式去嘗試解釋某啲金融議題
例如我哋兩個月之前就係seeking alpha解答過一個投資新手 點解油價會係負數
如下
Implications of Negative Oil Price


How it turned negative?
From the crude producers’ perspective, it is about a growing glut of crude and a lack of storage space.
Imagining you are a crude oil producer, what do you do if nobody wants the crude that comes out of your oil well?
You can’t burn it or pour it into the river. You can’t turn your oil wells off (oil wells are expensive to drill, and you think prices will be positive again in the future, so you don’t want to lose the well). However, oil keeps coming out from your wells in the meantime, so you need someone to take it off your hands, even if you need to pay for that. That’s why the price of crude can go negative.

From an investor’s perspective, why the WTI May Future fell to negative territory? What does it mean to buy an oil future like that?
First, buyer (sellers) of a single WTI May 2020 oil futures contract means someone makes an agreement to buy (sell) 1,000 barrels at the contract price in May 2020. The buyer of the contract will get the physical delivery of barrels of oil in May through different ways such as asking the seller to pump the oil into the buy’s designated pipeline or storage facility if they are linked to seller’s pipeline or storage facility (btw the oil flows from Cushing, Oklahoma).

Unlike refineries and airlines, traders basically don’t want the oil hence they rushed to sell the contracts on the final trading day of the future, leading to the price plunge.

“Wait… OPEC and its allies, known as OPEC+, got an oil production cut agreement on 9 April, right? Why oil price still dropped?”
Some members of OPEC+, led by Saudi Arabia and Russia, agreed to reduce production by 9.7 million barrels/day starting from 1 May 2020. However that was far from enough as demand was expected by the International Energy Agency (IEA) to fall 23million barrels/day this quarter amid the outbreak of COVID-19.

In the U.S, there is a total crude oil storage capacity of 653 million barrels with 374 million barrels currently stored as of April 10th. Over the past few weeks, there have been 10-19 million-barrel weekly builds, meaning capacity will run out in 18 weeks if the rate remains at 15 million barrels per week.

So, apart from buying futures, what investment I can make if I want to bet on an increase in oil price?
If you're looking to speculate on higher oil prices, your best bet is likely producer equities such as those in the Oil and Gas production ETF (XOP). These companies are all losing money at today's oil prices, but they are trading at a weighted average TTM "P/CF" of 1.3X. They also have greater control because they can slash production today and/or hedge their position and higher long-term prices.
-

佢係Equity research嘛 入面 asso 係最低級 升analyst要3至5年
snt 同 banker 先係asso大過analyst

1. 再一次證明連登仔最鍾意沖出嚟染 有邊一間BB FO係analyst大過associate? 屌真係笑撚死 你真係搵個窿匿埋算啦 唔好再回覆啦 而家人少少冇咩人見到

2. 我恥笑嘅正正就係呢好似樓上咁嘅連登仔 唔識又沖出嚟柒 唔識又唔願意自己去搵吓答案 唔識又係都要亂鳩咁估 on撚鳩鳩咁渾渾噩噩過世

再者我唔係因為自己有車有樓年薪好而睇人地唔起 我幾時都話莫欺少年窮 我從來都唔會因為自己有少少錢而狗眼看人低 比我有錢嘅人數之不盡

再強調我而家睇唔起嘅就係嗰班不學無術嘅連登仔 你去睇返上兩個月油價個post 成班友連google嘅能力都冇..乜鳩都亂咁估

最後gentle advice for a gentleman
大家應該將樓上嘅回覆引以為戒 經常提醒自己唔好沖出嚟柒 喺網上柒得多久而久之會影響埋你現實做人

如果大家想知多啲ibank grade ladders 可以上https://www.mergersandinquisitions.com/investment-banking-career-path/

on9仔自己柒咗又要起曬鋼 現實都唔知係咩人黎
你自己Google下equity research 最junior既位係咩啦弱智仔
係research入面analyst係可以寫文出paper既人 research associate係幫個analyst寫文既助手咋
BB fo 有邊間analyst大過asso？你做緊既美資bb equity research入面 Citi JP MS 全部都係analyst大過research associate 其它歐資行都係咁話
你連research入面咩位打咩位都唔知 仲話自己做美資bb equity research ？定係做麥當勞外賣仔睇過幾個wso post就衝出黎認叻？
我係你就真係搵個窿匿埋算啦 唔好再回覆啦 而家人少少冇咩人見到

replies.msg:
我以為自己記錯 專登碌返上去前面d post
明明係你最先用 "research asso" 呢個字眼
仲有係你自己講 "個title從來都係 research associate -> analyst -> sector head" 嘅
明明就係你搞錯晒job title同job grade
其實"research analyst"係job title 但人地個job grade係analyst -> asso -> avp ...
又例如 "quant analyst" 係job title/role name嚟 人地個grade係analyst -> asso -> vp ... (JPM好似係由asso開始 冇analyst)
比多個例子你做對比 "trading system developer" 係role嚟
佢個grade可以係analyst -> asso -> a/vp ...
當然有時個job title會跟著個grade嚟變
但唔同鋪 或者同鋪唔同team 個做法都唔一樣啦
